1.0.name: wordpress/easy-amazon-wishlist
1.0.description: This plugin will display an Amazon wishlist. You can search for the wishlist on all Amazon domains, including Amazon.com, Amazon.de, Amazon.co.jp, etc.. Future features include having more control over the look and feel of how the wishlist displays. Available in english, deutsch, español, français, italiano, 日本人, 中国的. For bugs or features contact: hokage@webmasterninjas.com
